item.title: Will Trump Accounts for Babies Really Be Worth $170,000 in 18 Years?
item.description: We did the math and found some assumptions behind the projected returns may be too optimistic.

item.title: The Simple Investing Habit Financial Advisors Swear By
item.description: Investing a set amount of money regularly can lead to high returns over time.

item.title: Why You Still Need to Carry a Wallet, Even in a Tap-to-Pay World
item.description: According to a study released earlier this year, two-thirds of the world's population will own a digital wallet by 2029.

item.title: How To Live Luxuriously on a Fixed Income
item.description: Focus on buying high-quality items and take advantage of credit card rewards programs.

item.title: This Is the New Retirement Reality in 2026
item.description: Retirement can be 40 years or more as people live longer than ever.
